## toNonExponential() function

将科学计数法的数字转为字符串

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toNonExponential(num: number): null | string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  num | number | 待转换值 |

**Returns:**

null \| string

转换结果

## Remarks

`4.496794759834739e-9  ==> 0.000000004496794759834739`

`4.496794759834739e+9  ==> 4496794759.834739`

若转换失败，则返回 `null`
